title: Doukyonin wa Hiza, Tokidoki, Atama no Ue. (My Roommate is a Cat)
synopsis: Subaru Mikazuki is a 23-year-old mystery novel author, major introvert, and an awkwardly shy person. He would much rather stay home to read a book than go outside and interact with others. Further exacerbating this life of solitude, his parents tragically died in an accident many years ago, leaving him alone in the world.
